channel.title: WebClient
channel.description:
Ivery thing is fine on the webclient till it loads and say this Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading Fireclan Client. The error occurrs when you are either on a slow computer, and sometimes happens to users Using firefox. We suggest using Internet Explorer for the best resuslts. If This Problem Is not been solved please reboot you're computer and change browser im not even using firefox and it says that on me go and see if it says same for you freewebs.com/fireclan10 updated link paste this in google !
Help!
